law.catch_line: Application period for sales tax incentive under KRS 148.853(3)(b)2.
law.text: New applications shall not be accepted or considered before August 1, 2014, or after May 1, 2018, for the sales tax incentive provided in KRS 148.853(3)(b)2. All projects with preliminary or final approval under KRS 148.851 to 148.860 on July 31, 2018, shall continue to be governed by KRS 148.851 to 148.860.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2014.
